  type="namespace"

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note, we assume here that void&#42; is related to raw malloc&#39;ed memory and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that malloc returns objects at least 4-byte aligned. However, this may be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// wrong, or pointers may be from something other than malloc. In this case,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// you should specify a real typed pointer or avoid this template.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// All clients should use assertions to do a run-time check to ensure that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this is actually true.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits-b09efd7701e511f6cdfa719094e47819/#af27fea0eb47fdcbf98bff1c8c8ba92de"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits-b09efd7701e511f6cdfa719094e47819/#af27fea0eb47fdcbf98bff1c8c8ba92de">NumLowBitsAvailable</a> = 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Provide PointerLikeTypeTraits for const things.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits-1b62896d0ae34fe34d98a024d6ed95b3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits">PointerLikeTypeTraits</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits-1b62896d0ae34fe34d98a024d6ed95b3/#a4bb471dbe2df72dceca1eb96dc807855"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits">PointerLikeTypeTraits&lt;T&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits-1b62896d0ae34fe34d98a024d6ed95b3/#a4bb471dbe2df72dceca1eb96dc807855">NonConst</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits-45e3dd3037422cbe6875c07935cc6c23/#a4778680b9ca5c4e0cfe02eda02643d6e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits-45e3dd3037422cbe6875c07935cc6c23/#a4778680b9ca5c4e0cfe02eda02643d6e">NumLowBitsAvailable</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Provide suitable custom traits struct for function pointers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Function pointers can&#39;t be directly given these traits as functions can&#39;t</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">/// have their alignment computed with &#96;alignof&#96; and we need different casting.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To rely on higher alignment for a specialized use, you can provide a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">/// customized form of this template explicitly with higher alignment, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">/// potentially use alignment attributes on functions to satisfy that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Alignment, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FunctionPo</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">erT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits">FunctionPointerLikeTypeTraits</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits/#a9270de90d202ecf2e3c2b99d4888eed3"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits/#a9270de90d202ecf2e3c2b99d4888eed3">NumLowBitsAvailable</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/constantlog2">detail::ConstantLog2&lt;Alignment&gt;::value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits/#ae588adf5b3cc5cf13935d184f362665e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits/#ae588adf5b3cc5cf13935d184f362665e">getAsVoidPointer</a>(FunctionPointerT <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uintptr&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">            ~((uintptr&#95;t)-1 &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits/#a9270de90d202ecf2e3c2b99d4888eed3">NumLowBitsAvailable</a>)) == 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Alignment not satisfied for an actual function pointer!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits/#ad53d1471afacf1b381c0cb3f5192251b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FunctionPointerT <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits/#ad53d1471afacf1b381c0cb3f5192251b">getFromVoidPointer</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">FunctionPointerT</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Provide a default specialization for function pointers that assumes 4-byte</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">/// alignment.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We assume here that functions used with this are always at least 4-byte</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">/// aligned. This means that, for example, thumb functions won&#39;t work or systems</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with weird unaligned function pointers won&#39;t work. But all practical systems</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">/// we support satisfy this requirement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ReturnT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">... ParamTs&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits-453c56941a508fa3befd79442e5b3c4b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pointerliketypetraits">PointerLikeTypeTraits</a>&lt;ReturnT (&#42;)(ParamTs...)&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/functionpointerliketypetraits">FunctionPointerLikeTypeTraits</a>&lt;4, ReturnT (&#42;)(ParamTs...)&gt; &#123;&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight></CodeLine>
